ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 28
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My alteration went up real fast when I soloed and began to use the root and nuke tactics (or is that root and pray is holds ?), since root is alteration.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 27 Apr 1999, Spehar, David J wrote:
> From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
> You will find that skills other than Evocation, Abjuration, and Channeling
> will need help.

My alteration went up real fast when I soloed and began to use the root
and nuke tactics (or is that root and pray is holds ?), since root is
alteration.

> This means you will need to help boost Divination (for later on when you get
> invisibility) and Alteration. Alteration is GATE and FADE/Shadow Step. I
> havet bothered with conjuration yet as Eye Of Zomm is fairly useless to me.

It IS quite useless. I bought it because I want to have every spell ever
made for our class. I sometimes practice conjuration at night when I'm not
grouped. I think a good use for this spell may be underwater corpse
searching. There's a shark ? Heh, it'll only eat my eye, I have lots of
others :)

Ramagh - Level 11 wizard (I want 12 !!!) - Fenin Ro
